snippet.title: Ascent - Trailer
snippet.description:
https://xrnz.itch.io/ascent

Ascent is an oniric first person platformer. Jump & fly from platform to platform, try to maintain altitude, do not fall into the pit. The lower you go, the weirder it gets...

Made in 48h for Geta Game Jam 8 : "Dreams & Nightmares" with hardmode (no words or text). My goal was to create a short and original experience, focusing on game feel & visuals. I cannot do 3D modelling, so most assets are from the Unity Asset Store. I did spend a lot of time modifying & compositing them, though !
